document.full_text: pakistan's most influential islamist party urged its followers to hold mass protests on friday to demand their government withdraw its support of the u.s. war on militancy after u.s. commandos killed osama bin laden near islamabad.
document.title: pakistan islamists to protest against u.s. bin laden raid
lines_and_colors: pakistan's most influential islamist party urged its followers to hold mass protests on friday to demand their government withdraw its support of the u.s. war on militancy after u.s. commandos killed osama bin laden near islamabad.
